    if (!vaVars.user_loggedin) {
        //User is Not LoggedIn
        var agentSupport = [];
        agentSupport.push(gs.getMessage("To connect to a Live Agent, or to check what I can help with now, select {0}. To see more, log in first.",gs.getMessage('Show me everything')));
        vaSystem.sendTopicPickerControl(agentSupport.join(' '));
    }
    else {
        //User is LoggedIn
        var greetingMessages = [];
        greetingMessages.push(gs.getMessage('Let me know how I can help you today ? '));
        greetingMessages.push(vaSystem.getTopicSelectionMessage());
        vaSystem.sendTopicPickerControl(greetingMessages.join(''));
    }
})()
